altername_name: Guntu: Western Front June, 1944: Tetsu no Kioku
name: Guntu Western Front June, 1944
overview: Guntu Western Front June, 1944 is a first person rail shooter set during World War II. It takes place in occupied France just prior to the invasion of Normandy and the task in each of the game's six levels is to destroy a certain target, usually some sort of tank or other heavily armoured object.
